root.name: Moon: Remix RPG Adventure
root.description: OverviewMoon: Remix RPG Adventure is an role-playing title for the PlayStation that was the first in a trilogy of games developed by Love-de-Lic and was published by ASCII Entertainment in Japan on October 16, 1997. The game has since become a cult classic that is highly praised for deconstructing the conventions and tropes of the Japanese role-playing genre. ASCII had plans to release Moon in the United States and even featured the game prominently at E3 1997 but sadly the released was canceled for undefined reasons. An English translation patch is currently being worked on by SteveMartin and Esperknight at Romhacking dot net.
